text: Hugh Martin (born 3 August 1947) is a South African cricketer. He played ten first-class matches for Transvaal B and New South Wales between 1970/71 and 1971/72. ==See also== * List of New South Wales representative cricketers ==References== ==External links== * Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:South African cricketers Category:Gauteng cricketers Category:New South Wales cricketers Category:People from Chivhu
title: Hugh Martin (cricketer)
